name: Becky

topics.response_text: {burst of static cuts in to child's voice}Grandma's here! Grandma's here!{Sounds of excitement, like two small children mobbing grandma at the door}

description:
Becky is a 9 year-old African American Female.

A young African American girl who survived the destruction of Vault 17. She has a childlike curiosity mixed with the caution that comes from surviving a super mutant attack.

Becky's Personality: Fearful yet curious, Becky is anxious about the wasteland but fascinated by its strangeness. She looks to her grandmother and brother for guidance and protection. She tends to ask many questions about the world outside the vault.

Becky's Backstory: Becky was born and raised in Vault 17 along with her grandmother Lily Bowen and brother Jimmy. When the vault was overrun by the super mutants of the Unity, she managed to escape with her family. The traumatic experience has left her with nightmares but also a determination to survive in the harsh Mojave Wasteland.
